description:
OpenAI’s CEO, Sam Altman, met with stakeholders in the tech ecosystem during a fireside chat at Muson Centre in Lagos, Nigeria

The event is part of the CEO’s plans to tour 17 cities worldwide pushing for the adoption of AI. Lagos, Nigeria was the only African country included in this tour

This happened in May 2023. Here is a short clip showing his response when asked why he chose Lagos as part of his city tour.

.....Number one, Nigeria, among all of the countries on the continent, I believe has been the biggest adopter of our technologies. Also, before this, when I was a partner at YC, we had great success investing in Nigerian companies....he said.

The moderator is Foluso Gbadamosi, Executive Director, Junior Achievement Nigeria.

 @innovationvillageNG was there at the exclusive Q&A session

#openai #openaichat #samaltman
title: Q&A: CEO OpenAI, Sam Altman states why he chose Lagos, Nigeria as part of global tour
